data: undefined (Discover the captivating world of authentic Flamenco music as iconic Composer Manuel de Fallais, along with Zuloaga and García Lorca, organized the first Cante Jondo contest in Granada, determined to preserve the essence of traditional Flamenco.)

Discover the captivating world of authentic Flamenco music as iconic Composer Manuel de Fallais, along with Zuloaga and García Lorca, organized the first Cante Jondo contest in Granada, determined to preserve the essence of traditional Flamenco.
